name: R5-ConditionClinicalStatusCodes-R4-ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ConditionClinicalStatusCodes into FHIR R4

target.display: The subject is currently experiencing the symptoms of the condition or there is evidence of the condition.
target.comment: R5 `active` is assumed equivalent to R4 `active` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: The subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition or there is no longer evidence of the condition.
target.comment: R5 `inactive` is assumed equivalent to R4 `inactive` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: The subject is experiencing a re-occurence or repeating of a previously resolved condition, e.g. urinary tract infection, pancreatitis, cholangitis, conjunctivitis.
target.comment: R5 `recurrence` is assumed equivalent to R4 `recurrence` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: The subject is experiencing a return of a condition, or signs and symptoms after a period of improvement or remission, e.g. relapse of cancer, multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus, bipolar disorder, [psychotic relapse of] schizophrenia, etc.
target.comment: R5 `relapse` is assumed equivalent to R4 `relapse` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: The subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition, but there is a risk of the symptoms returning.
target.comment: R5 `remission` is assumed equivalent to R4 `remission` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: The subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition and there is a negligible perceived risk of the symptoms returning.
target.comment: R5 `resolved` is assumed equivalent to R4 `resolved` (no map, but codes match)
